matlabcontrol v4.0.0
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
matlabcontrol is a Java API that allows for calling MATLAB from Java.

See:
          Description

Packages
matlabcontrol Contains the core functionality to interact with MATLAB.
matlabcontrol.extensions Extensions which enhance MatlabProxy's capabilities.

 

matlabcontrol is a Java API that allows for calling MATLAB from Java. It operates by interacting with a running session of MATLAB. Start by creating a MatlabProxyFactory.

Author:
Joshua Kaplan
